scripts.deploy: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ asselstine/pooltogether subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ asselstine/pooltogether-rinkeby subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 asselstine/pooltogether subgraph.local.yaml
